Gender-Neutral Bathroom Petition

Support inclusive, safe restrooms for all students in Ohio schools.

The Issue

Non-binary and trans students often face barriers accessing school bathrooms. Some must request special permission to use the nurse's office bathroom, causing discomfort and unnecessary stress.

All students deserve safe, accessible, and inclusive restrooms. Gender-neutral bathrooms help create a fair and supportive school environment for everyone.

We call on every Ohio school to provide at least one gender-neutral bathroom per building or per floor.
